name: M.U.D.-Match
description:
Are you ready for a Multi-User-Dungeon-Party?
This Prototype sends you out on a Dungeon Crawl, supercharged with Card-Game-Mechanics! Battle wacky Monsters to collect power gems, either on your own or against up to 5 other players!

The first who collects 6 power gems wins the M.U.D.-Match!

Matches are automatically created/joined via Match-Name
